    The SSBSE is the premier international research symposium on Search-based Software Engineering.

    IWOR'18 will be hosted in Montpellier, France, September 2018.

    The conference will be co-located with ASE 2018

    Important Dates
    June 03: Deadline for submissions
    July 08: Notification of authors
    July 31: Camera-ready
    Sept 04: Workshop date.

    Register Here

    IWOR is the premier international research symposium on Search-based Software Engineering.
